questions.question: What is the name of Drake's dragon?

options.A: Worm
options.B: Vulcan
options.C: Kinguk
options.D: Mamu

questions.explanation: Drake's dragon is named Worm, a large brown earth dragon.

questions.question: Where were Drake and Rory at the beginning of the story?

options.A: King Roland's castle in the kingdom
options.B: The Dragon Islands in the ocean
options.C: An empty classroom in the castle
options.D: The cold snowy land of Barga

questions.explanation: Drake and Rory were in an empty classroom in the Castle of the Wizards, waiting for Jaina.

questions.question: What type of dragon is Vulcan?

options.A: Earth dragon
options.B: Fire dragon
options.C: Dream dragon
options.D: Water dragon

questions.explanation: Vulcan is Rory's fire dragon.

questions.question: Who is Wolfgang's father?

options.A: Drake
options.B: Maldred
options.C: King Roland
options.D: Zoltan

questions.explanation: Wolfgang is the son of Zoltan, the wizard who transformed into a wizard dragon.

questions.question: What color does Worm's body glow when he transports?

options.A: Green
options.B: Blue
options.C: Red
options.D: Pink

questions.explanation: Worm's body glows green when he uses his transportation powers.

questions.question: What is the name of the head wizard?

options.A: Nuna
options.B: Jaina
options.C: Kishar
options.D: Rory

questions.explanation: Jaina is the white-haired head wizard who wears an orange dress.

questions.question: What land is covered in snow where Wolfgang went?

options.A: Gothica
options.B: The Dragon Islands
options.C: Barga
options.D: The Dream World

questions.explanation: Barga is a cold land covered in snow where Wolfgang went to find his father.

questions.question: What type of dragon is Kinguk?

options.A: Fire dragon
options.B: Dream dragon
options.C: Water dragon
options.D: Earth dragon

questions.explanation: Kinguk is an earth dragon, the same type as Worm.

questions.question: What does 'Kinguk' mean in Nuna's language?

options.A: Worm
options.B: Earth
options.C: Guardian
options.D: Dragon

questions.explanation: Nuna explains that 'Kinguk' means 'worm' in the language of her land.

questions.question: What was Maldred transformed into before being trapped in a bottle?

options.A: 100 spiders
options.B: 100 flies
options.C: 100 bats
options.D: 100 birds

questions.explanation: Maldred was transformed into 100 flies and trapped in a red bottle guarded by the Naga.

questions.question: What plant did Nuna use to heal Kinguk?

options.A: Moonflower
options.B: Dragonmoss
options.C: Stinkweed
options.D: Iceleaf

questions.explanation: Nuna used a plant called stinkweed to make tea that cured Kinguk of Zoltan's magic.

questions.question: What powerful dragon guards Maldred's bottle?

options.A: Worm
options.B: Vulcan
options.C: Kinguk
options.D: The Naga

questions.explanation: The Naga, the Earthquake Dragon, guards the bottle containing Maldred.

questions.question: What happens when the Naga turns his eye to a place?

options.A: An earthquake happens
options.B: It floods
options.C: It freezes
options.D: It catches fire

questions.explanation: When the Naga turns his eye to a place, he causes an earthquake.

questions.question: What color magic came from Wolfgang's wand when he gave Drake a coat?

options.A: Green
options.B: Blue
options.C: Red
options.D: Purple

questions.explanation: Blue magic sparks came out of Wolfgang's wand when he created a warm coat for Drake.

questions.question: Who is Rory's dragon?

options.A: Worm
options.B: Kinguk
options.C: Vulcan
options.D: Mamu

questions.explanation: Vulcan is Rory's fire dragon.

questions.question: What did Zoltan transform into?

options.A: A wizard dragon
options.B: A snow monster
options.C: A giant fly
options.D: An ice wizard

questions.explanation: Zoltan transformed into a wizard dragon, a dragon with both dragon powers and wizard magic.

questions.question: How old is Wolfgang?

options.A: Five years old
options.B: Ten years old
options.C: Six years old
options.D: Eight years old

questions.explanation: Wolfgang tells his father 'I'm only eight' during their conversation.

questions.question: What color were Zoltan's dragon scales?

options.A: Blue
options.B: Pink
options.C: Black
options.D: Green

questions.explanation: Zoltan's wizard dragon form had pink dragon scales covered with magical symbols.

questions.question: What color wings did Zoltan have as a wizard dragon?

options.A: Pink
options.B: Red
options.C: Orange
options.D: Purple

questions.explanation: Orange wings sprouted from Zoltan's back in his wizard dragon form.

questions.question: What stone did Drake wear around his neck?

options.A: A blue sapphire stone
options.B: A red ruby crystal
options.C: A white diamond gem
options.D: A green dragon stone

questions.explanation: Drake wore a green dragon stone around his neck, which glows when dragons are near.

questions.question: Wolfgang explained that everyone at wizard school had been teasing him because...

options.A: his father transformed into a dragon and flew past the castle where everyone saw him
options.B: his father accidentally destroyed the school library with a failed magic spell
options.C: his father was caught stealing ancient spell books from the headmaster's office
options.D: his father got into a big fight with the head wizard during a ceremony

questions.explanation: Wolfgang said 'Ever since my dad turned into a dragon and flew past the castle, everyone's been teasing me.'

questions.question: Wolfgang told Drake that if Zoltan's dream world plan failed, his father knew about...

options.A: an ancient magic spell that could summon the Naga to any location he wanted
options.B: a secret doorway hidden in Barga that led directly to where the Naga lived
options.C: a powerful wizard who could help him break into the Naga's temple by force
options.D: a magical map showing all the hidden entrances to the Dragon Islands

questions.explanation: Wolfgang said his dad 'knew about a secret doorway to the Naga in a land called Barga.'

questions.question: When Drake and Wolfgang arrived in the ice cave in Barga, they discovered...

options.A: a group of snow monsters guarding the entrance to the Naga's secret door
options.B: Zoltan waiting for them with a trap that he had prepared in advance
options.C: a girl named Nuna kneeling beside her injured earth dragon Kinguk
options.D: an old wizard who had been protecting the secret door for many years

questions.explanation: They found Nuna, a Dragon Master, kneeling next to her injured earth dragon Kinguk.

questions.question: Nuna was able to heal her dragon Kinguk from Zoltan's dark magic by...

options.A: using a special crystal that absorbed all of the dark energy from Kinguk's body
options.B: calling on the power of the Naga to remove the curse from her dragon
options.C: asking Drake to use his dragon stone to transfer healing energy to Kinguk
options.D: making stinkweed tea and singing a traditional healing song from her people

questions.explanation: Nuna made tea from stinkweed and sang a healing song from her people while Kinguk drank it.

questions.question: Drake explained to Wolfgang that the dream amulet from Kishar had the special power to...

options.A: transform Zoltan back into a human if they could get close enough to use it
options.B: control any dragon that looked directly into the glowing light of the amulet
options.C: open a portal to the dream world where Zoltan's transformation first happened
options.D: protect the person wearing it from all wizard magic including Zoltan's spells

questions.explanation: Drake explained that Kishar gave him the dream amulet, which 'has the power to transform Zoltan back into a human.'

questions.question: When a snow monster attacked them in the cave, Nuna commanded Kinguk to...

options.A: shoot a beam of earth energy directly at the monster to knock it backward
options.B: create a wall of rocks to block the monster from reaching the group
options.C: crack open the ground so the snow monster would fall into the hole
options.D: tunnel underground and attack the snow monster from behind by surprise

questions.explanation: Nuna commanded 'Kinguk, crack the earth,' and the dragon opened a crack in the floor that trapped the snow monster.

questions.question: The dream amulet was destroyed when Drake accidentally dropped it and...

options.A: it shattered into a thousand pieces when it hit the hard stone floor of the cave
options.B: Zoltan quickly blasted it with red magic before Drake could pick it back up
options.C: a snow monster grabbed it and crushed it in its powerful frozen claws
options.D: the Naga's earthquake knocked it into a deep crack in the ground forever

questions.explanation: When Drake dropped the amulet, Zoltan cried 'Confectus!' and hit it with red magic, causing it to burst into pieces.

questions.question: When Jaina finally arrived at the ice cave riding on Vulcan, she immediately...

options.A: attacked Zoltan with a powerful spell that pushed him away from the door
options.B: placed a glowing dragon stone around Wolfgang's neck to make him a Dragon Master
options.C: created a magical barrier around the group to protect them from Zoltan
options.D: ordered all the dragons to work together to capture Zoltan in an energy cage

questions.explanation: Jaina jumped from Vulcan's back and placed a dragon stone around Wolfgang's neck, making him a Dragon Master.

questions.question: The closing spell for the secret door to the Naga only worked when...

options.A: all four Dragon Masters joined together and spoke the words at the same time
options.B: Zoltan finally agreed to help Jaina and they both said the spell together
options.C: Wolfgang used his new dragon stone connection to add power to Jaina's spell
options.D: the Naga himself gave permission for the door to be sealed shut forever

questions.explanation: Jaina started the spell but it only worked when 'Zoltan joined her in saying the spell. Cloud ostium.'

questions.question: After the 100 mini-Maldreds broke through the energy shield, they all escaped by...

options.A: flying out through a crack in the cave ceiling that led to the sky outside
options.B: running in different directions so fast that no one could catch any of them
options.C: poofing away one by one until every single mini-Maldred had disappeared
options.D: combining back into one Maldred who then teleported to a secret location

questions.explanation: Each winged Maldred disappeared in an instant with 'poof, poof, poof' - they escaped by poofing away.

questions.question: Wolfgang explained that after his mother died, his father Zoltan changed because...

options.A: he started ignoring Wolfgang completely and spent all his time studying magic alone
options.B: he became very overprotective and never let Wolfgang leave the house anymore
options.C: he stopped practicing magic entirely and became very sad and quiet all the time
options.D: he blamed Wolfgang for what happened and refused to teach him any more spells

questions.explanation: Wolfgang said 'Dad started ignoring me to study magic all the time. He was always down in his workshop.'

questions.question: Drake and Worm were able to follow Wolfgang to the ice cave in Barga because...

options.A: Drake's dragon stone started glowing brighter whenever they got closer to Wolfgang
options.B: Worm could sense and follow the trail of magical energy that Wolfgang left behind
options.C: Jaina used her wizard powers to show them exactly where Wolfgang had gone
options.D: they found footprints in the snow that led them all the way to the cave entrance

questions.explanation: Worm told Drake 'If we transport now, I can follow Wolfgang's trail of magical energy.'

questions.question: Nuna explained that the secret door to the Naga in Barga was created long ago so that...

options.A: powerful wizards could visit the Naga to learn ancient magic from the great dragon
options.B: Dragon Masters could reach the Naga quickly in case the Dragon Islands were destroyed
options.C: evil villains like Maldred could be brought to the Naga for punishment and prison
options.D: the Naga could escape from the temple if enemies ever tried to attack him there

questions.explanation: Nuna explained the door 'was created years after the Temple of the Naga was built, as a way to reach the Naga if the Dragon Islands are ever destroyed.'

questions.question: Wolfgang chose to cast the dancing radish spell against his father because...

options.A: it was the very first spell that Zoltan ever taught him when he was young
options.B: the spell was so powerful that even Zoltan would not be able to block it
options.C: Jaina told him it was the only spell that could break through Zoltan's shield
options.D: he remembered that his father always hated that spell more than any other

questions.explanation: Wolfgang said 'It's the first spell you ever taught me, Dad' when he cast the dancing radish spell.

questions.question: The dancing radish spell worked on Zoltan because when he saw it, he...

options.A: became confused and forgot what he was doing because the spell was so strange
options.B: remembered happy memories of teaching young Wolfgang magic when he was five
options.C: realized that Wolfgang had become a more powerful wizard than him already
options.D: felt embarrassed that such a silly spell was being used against a wizard dragon

questions.explanation: Zoltan stopped and remembered: 'That was so long ago... You were so good at magic, even at age five. I was so proud of you.'

questions.question: When Zoltan attacked with his magic, Nuna's dragon Kinguk was able to escape by...

options.A: flying up to the ceiling of the cave where Zoltan's magic could not reach her
options.B: hiding behind a large boulder that blocked the blast of Zoltan's powerful spell
options.C: creating a shield of earth energy that absorbed all of Zoltan's magical attack
options.D: diving headfirst into the cave floor and tunneling deep into the earth below

questions.explanation: Before Zoltan's attack could hit Kinguk, 'she dove headfirst into the cave floor. She tunneled into the earth, escaping the attack.'

questions.question: Wolfgang was finally able to calm his father's wild dragon energy by using his new dragon stone to...

options.A: send pictures of happy family memories from when they used to play at the beach
options.B: show Zoltan images of what would happen if he continued on his dangerous path
options.C: transfer peaceful energy from his own mind directly into his father's thoughts
options.D: connect to Zoltan's human side that was still trapped inside the dragon body

questions.explanation: Using his new dragon master connection, Wolfgang sent pictures with his mind of 'playing in the sand at the beach like we used to with Mom.'

questions.question: The red bottle containing Maldred finally broke when...

options.A: Zoltan hit it with his magic trying to free Maldred as quickly as he could
options.B: the Naga caused a powerful earthquake that made the bottle tip over and shatter
options.C: one of the mini-Maldreds flew into the bottle and knocked it off the shelf
options.D: Drake accidentally bumped into the shelf while trying to escape from the cave

questions.explanation: During the Naga's strongest earthquake, 'the red bottle... tipped over and shattered into pieces.'

questions.question: When Maldred was freed from the bottle, instead of becoming one wizard again, he...

options.A: split into 100 tiny cat-sized versions of himself that each had wings to fly
options.B: transformed into a giant monster that was even more powerful than before
options.C: became invisible and escaped without anyone being able to see where he went
options.D: was so weak that he could barely move and had to be carried out of the cave

questions.explanation: Each mini-Maldred was 'the size of a cat' and 'a wizard with a red body, an eye patch, and a pointy red beard.'

questions.question: Jaina and Zoltan worked together to protect the group by combining their magic to create...

options.A: a powerful attack spell that pushed all the mini-Maldreds away from the group
options.B: a teleportation circle that would transport everyone safely back to the castle
options.C: an energy shield made of silver and pink magic to block the mini-Maldreds
options.D: a cage of magical energy that trapped several of the mini-Maldreds inside

questions.explanation: Jaina's 'silver magic' combined with Zoltan's 'pink magic' to form the energy shield.

questions.question: Why couldn't Worm's energy bubble alone capture Zoltan?

options.A: The magical symbols on Zoltan's body made it fizzle out
options.B: Worm was exhausted from transporting to the ice cave
options.C: The ice cave's cold blocked all earth dragon powers
options.D: Zoltan flew away too fast for the bubble to catch

questions.explanation: When Worm tried to trap Zoltan, 'the magical symbols on the dragon's body glowed brightly, and the energy bubble fizzled out.'

questions.question: What made Zoltan's power shield weaken enough for Wolfgang to break it?

options.A: The Naga's powerful energy interfered with his magic
options.B: Zoltan was putting all his energy into opening the door
options.C: Jaina secretly cast a powerful counter-spell on it
options.D: The freezing ice cave slowly drained all his power

questions.explanation: Wolfgang said 'He is putting all of his energy into opening the door. That could weaken the shield.'

questions.question: Why did Zoltan say he wanted so much power?

options.A: To protect Wolfgang from all the dangerous enemies in the world
options.B: To become the supreme ruler of all the magical kingdoms
options.C: Because with more power years ago, he might have saved his wife
options.D: To get revenge on all the wizards who had expelled him

questions.explanation: Zoltan admitted 'Because I used to be weak... If I had more power years ago, I might have saved your mother.'

questions.question: Why was Jaina's suggestion for Wolfgang to become Zoltan's dragon master important?

options.A: It would automatically transform Zoltan back into a human
options.B: Dragon masters have the power to control all wizard dragons
options.C: It would give Wolfgang complete power over Zoltan's body
options.D: Wolfgang could use the mental connection to calm Zoltan

questions.explanation: Jaina said 'Use your mind to connect to his mind. You can help him calm the wild dragon energy inside him.'

questions.question: What does the story suggest about wizards becoming dragon masters?

options.A: It is very rare for wizards to become dragon masters
options.B: Wizards are forbidden from becoming dragon masters
options.C: All wizards will eventually become dragon masters
options.D: Dragon masters are always much stronger than wizards

questions.explanation: Jaina told Wolfgang 'It is very rare for wizards to become dragon masters. But now you can use magic' - showing it's unusual but possible.

questions.question: Why was the dream amulet the only way to transform Zoltan back?

options.A: It was created specifically to work on Zoltan's magic
options.B: Wizard magic cannot undo the magic of the dream world
options.C: Only Drake had the power to activate and use the amulet
options.D: The Naga had blessed it with very special unique powers

questions.explanation: Jaina explained 'wizard magic cannot help your father... Drake's amulet is the only way I know of to undo the magic of the dream world.'

questions.question: What went wrong with Zoltan's spell to free Maldred?

options.A: It accidentally destroyed Maldred instead of freeing him
options.B: It freed the powerful Naga dragon instead of Maldred
options.C: It created 100 separate mini-Maldreds instead of one
options.D: It made Maldred completely invisible and unable to speak

questions.explanation: Zoltan's spell said 'One hundred flies are in here now, but Maldred there shall be' but instead each fly became a separate mini-Maldred.

questions.question: Why couldn't Nuna and Kinguk leave to help chase the Maldreds?

options.A: Kinguk was still too weak from Zoltan's attack
options.B: The Naga had commanded them to stay behind
options.C: Wolfgang needed them to guard his father Zoltan
options.D: They are sworn to protect the secret door always

questions.explanation: Nuna said 'I wish I could help you go after Maldred, but Kinguk and I cannot leave the Naga door.'

questions.question: What is ironic about Zoltan's situation at the end of the story?

options.A: His young son became his dragon master now
options.B: He became far more powerful than Maldred
options.C: He lost every single one of his wizard powers
options.D: He was trapped in a bottle just like Maldred

questions.explanation: The father-son dynamic reversed: the child Wolfgang became the dragon master to his dragon-father Zoltan.

questions.question: Why did the team of wizards go to the Dragon Islands instead of Barga?

options.A: They didn't know about the secret door located in Barga
options.B: Jaina sent them in case Wolfgang was wrong about Zoltan
options.C: The powerful Naga had summoned them all there
options.D: They were chasing after a completely different villain

questions.explanation: Jaina said 'We sent them on to the Dragon Islands in case Wolfgang was wrong about where his father went.'

questions.question: What does Worm's reaction to seeing Kinguk reveal about earth dragons?

options.A: Earth dragons are very common across all the kingdoms
options.B: Earth dragons are natural enemies that fight each other
options.C: Worm hadn't seen another earth dragon in a long time
options.D: Earth dragons are unable to communicate with each other

questions.explanation: Worm said 'This is the first time I have seen another earth dragon since I was taken to King Roland's castle.'

questions.question: Why was Wolfgang conflicted about stopping his father?

options.A: He secretly wanted all the power for himself
options.B: He didn't believe his father was truly evil
options.C: He wanted to stop Zoltan but not hurt him
options.D: He was very afraid of the other dragon masters

questions.explanation: Wolfgang said 'I don't want him to get hurt' and asked Drake 'You won't hurt him, will you?' showing his conflicted feelings.

questions.question: What can be inferred about why Zoltan became obsessed with Maldred?

options.A: Maldred was his childhood friend from wizard school
options.B: The wizard council ordered him to study Maldred's magic
options.C: The evil Maldred had threatened to harm his son Wolfgang
options.D: He wanted power to cope with grief after his wife's death

questions.explanation: Zoltan admitted he felt 'weak' and believed more power could have saved his wife - his grief drove his obsession with gaining power through Maldred.

questions.question: What does the ending set up for future events?

options.A: 100 Maldreds are loose and must be stopped
options.B: The Naga will finally be freed from prison
options.C: Wolfgang will quit wizard school and leave
options.D: Zoltan will return to being a normal wizard

questions.explanation: Jaina's final words were 'We have 100 Maldreds to stop' - setting up the next conflict.

questions.question: Why did Drake think telling Zoltan about the dream amulet was a mistake?

options.A: The amulet only worked if the target didn't know about it
options.B: Knowing about it made Zoltan try to destroy it first
options.C: Jaina had strictly forbidden them from mentioning it
options.D: It made young Wolfgang look weak to his father

questions.explanation: When Wolfgang mentioned the amulet, Drake thought 'Telling Zoltan about the stone wasn't part of the plan' - and Zoltan immediately destroyed it.

questions.question: What lesson does Wolfgang's success in reaching his father suggest?

options.A: Children should always listen to and obey their parents
options.B: Magic is always going to be more powerful than emotions
options.C: Emotional connections can be more powerful than force
options.D: Wizards are always going to be superior to dragon masters

questions.explanation: All the attacks failed, but Wolfgang's emotional appeal through shared memories succeeded in reaching his father.

questions.question: How did Rory and Jaina find the location of the secret door?

options.A: Wolfgang sent them a magical message with the location
options.B: The powerful Naga used his magic to guide them there
options.C: Vulcan the fire dragon could sense Zoltan's energy
options.D: Jaina found it in the castle library after Rory told her

questions.explanation: Rory said 'I told Jaina' about Barga, and 'she found the location of the secret door in the castle library.'

questions.question: What does Nuna's healing song suggest about her culture?

options.A: Her people worship the powerful Naga dragon
options.B: Her people combine traditional songs with healing
options.C: Her people don't trust any wizard magic at all
options.D: Her people are all trained to be dragon masters

questions.explanation: Nuna explained 'it is a song for healing that my people sing when someone is ill. I think it might help' - combining traditional song with the stinkweed medicine.

questions.question: Why couldn't even two powerful wizards' combined magic stop the 100 Maldreds?

options.A: The collective power of 100 Maldreds was too strong
options.B: The Maldreds had absorbed all of the Naga's power
options.C: Zoltan was secretly helping all of the Maldreds
options.D: The ice cave had weakened all of their magic

questions.explanation: Drake realized 'Not even the magic of two powerful wizards can stop 100 Maldreds' - their combined numbers overwhelmed the shield.

questions.question: What does Zoltan's apology to Wolfgang reveal about his character?

options.A: He was only pretending to change his ways
options.B: He blamed Wolfgang for everything that happened
options.C: He wanted Wolfgang to join the evil Maldred
options.D: He was never truly evil, just lost in grief

questions.explanation: Zoltan apologized saying 'I lost my focus when your mother died. I should have focused all of my energies on you' - showing grief, not evil, drove his actions.
